channel.title: Ticket recieving minigame?
channel.description: OK I think I have a fun minigame that allows you to receive tickets based on your performance. What I can't figure out how to do is to add a shop that lets you trade tickets for stuff. Is this possible or will i have to make commands to trade tickets for stuff? Also how can I make the tickets un-tradeable?

item.title: Ticket recieving minigame?
item.dc:creator: @adamhelloman8 adamhelloman8
item.description:
@adamhelloman8 wrote:

Lol. theres most likely not that config file.

Other than the auto spawning of the npc, its all in you’re client class.

Well, im guessing you’re source is somehow based of delta, so to make items untradeable, it will be in you’re

public int[] noTrade

I won’t totally give it to you, but heres a hint for the shop

Look at how the tzhaar tokkul shop is made.

Read full topic

item.title: Ticket recieving minigame?
item.dc:creator: @azza123 azza123
item.description:
@azza123 wrote:

Im not too sure about the shop, but i know there should be a file somewhere in your source, that is called “untradeable.cfg” or something along them lines and there is some way to add the item to that, not sure how sorry i’ve never attempted to do something like that.
anyways hope this helps

Read full topic
